sentences.sentence: The women, I noticed, were all clutching machetes.
sentences.translation: 我注意到所有的女人也都拿着砍刀。

sentences.sentence: Pictures of angry men with machetes have scared off holidaymakers from the coast.
sentences.translation: 度假者们看到拿着弯刀且愤怒的人的照片就已经被从海岸吓跑了。

sentences.sentence: When your (white) correspondent happens along, they take aim with stones, machetes and poles.
sentences.translation: 当你的(白人)记者恰好路过时，他们就会用石头、弯刀与木杆对准目标攻击。
